mapper.sql: ID, ENTRYNUM, ENTRYDATE, DELIVERYCOMPANY, CLIENT, CARNUM, OPERATOR_, STORAGELOCATIONID, PRODUCINGYEAR, PRODUCINGAREA
mapper.select: SELECT re.entrynum,us.name_ OPERATOR_,re.entrydate,decom.name_ DELIVERYCOM , clcom.name_ CLIENT ,re.carnum,sl.name_ storagelocation,pa.name_ producingarea,re.producingyear FROM RAWENTRY re JOIN company decom ON decom.id = re.deliverycompany JOIN company clcom ON clcom.ID = re.client JOIN USERS us ON us.id = re.operator_ JOIN producingarea pa ON pa.id = re.producingarea JOIN storagelocation sl ON sl.id = re.storagelocationid WHERE re.id = #{rawentryId}

SELECT rc.id RCID,rc.checknum CHECKNUM,tl.levelname_ LEVELNA, tt.name_ TOBACCOCATEGORY,rd.checkweight checkweight FROM Rawcheck rc JOIN Rawtobacco rt ON rt.id = rc.rawtobacco JOIN tobaccolevel tl ON rt.level_ = tl.levelid JOIN tobaccocategory tt ON tt.id = rt.tobaccocategory JOIN RAWCHECKDETAIL rd ON rd.checkinfo = rc.id WHERE rc.checknum = #{checkNumber}

select RAWENTRY_SEQ.NEXTVAL-1 FROM dual
insert into RAWENTRY (ID, ENTRYNUM, ENTRYDATE, DELIVERYCOMPANY, CLIENT, CARNUM, OPERATOR_, STORAGELOCATIONID, PRODUCINGYEAR, PRODUCINGAREA) values (RAWENTRY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{entrynum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entrydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deliverycompany,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{client,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{carnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{storagelocationid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{producingyear,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{producingarea,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
